channel.title: Sporting injuries on Cryos
channel.description: Recent content in Sporting injuries on Cryos

item.title: Postural Evaluation By Imaging - Cryos Technologies
item.description: Health professionals use imaging devices and systems for a variety of medical purposes. A validated and recommended approach used by some foot doctors is to use imaging systems to more accurately evaluate and measure postural and biomechanical problems. The visual nature of this technology allows patients to more easily understand the mechanics behind their condition and its impact on their posture. WHAT IS POSTURAL IMAGING? Postural imaging is a measurement tool that helps with the diagnostic process by providing objective data in real time.
